game.name: Train Simulator: Pegnitztalbahn: Nürnberg - Bayreuth Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The picturesque countryside of Bavaria awaits! Lean into the scenic unelectrified curves and lush forested hills of Germany with our next route for Train Simulator Classic, Pegnitztalbahn: Nürnberg - Bayreuth.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The picturesque countryside of Bavaria awaits! Lean into the scenic unelectrified curves and lush forested hills of Germany with our next route for Train Simulator Classic, Pegnitztalbahn: Nürnberg - Bayreuth.
